content: Slack actively promotes this behavior by leaving the user a self message with this text, I think we should do similarly.
I would say it's more part of their broader feature to have a big "Start of your PM conversation with X" feature, which needs custom text for the thread with yourself.

We'd be happy to include that sort of top-of-feed notice if done carefully (needs to only appear when actually at the top of the feed). If we're doing it, the goal would be to have it at least partially replace the "empty search" notices to avoid duplication.
